Display.DisplaysersorValue: The screen displays the value of the sensor
Display.setDisplay2: Any value displayed on the screen
Sensor.GetColorSensor: Get the colour sensor port value 颜色
Sensor.GetGyroscopGeSensor: Get the GyroscopGe sensor port value 陀螺仪1
Sensor.GetGyroscopGeSensor2: Get the GyroscopGe sensor port value 陀螺仪2
Sensor.GetPhotosensitiveValue: Get the value of Photosensitive sensor on a port 光敏值
Sensor.GetSoundsensor: Set the Sound sensor status,1 detect the sound source,0 no detect the sound source 声音
Sensor.GetTemperaturesensorValue:
Get the value of a sensor on a port

Get the value of Temperature sensor on a port 温度
Sensor.GetavoidSensor: Get the obstacle avoidance sensor status,1 detect obstacle,0 no detect obstacle 避障判断
Sensor.GetlineSensor: Get the line follower sensor port value 巡线
Sensor.GetultrasonicValue: Get the value of ultrasonic sensor on a port 超声波
hicbit.set_Dual_motor: Set interface motor1 and motor2 speed , that can control turn.etc.
hicbit.set_Single_motor: Set interface motor speed , that can control turn.etc.
hicbit_control.hicbit_Init: hicbit initialization, please execute at boot time
hicbit_control.wait_ms: Pause for the specified time in milliseconds
hicbit_control.wait_ms|param|ms: how long to pause for, eg: 100, 200, 500
hicbit_control.wait_s: Pause for the specified time in seconds
hicbit_control.wait_s|param|s: how long to pause for, eg: 1, 2, 5, 10, 20,
